properties.name: app.security.public-urls
properties.description: A comma-separated list of URL patterns that should be accessible without authentication.

properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: The secret key used to sign and verify JSON Web Tokens (JWT) for authentication.

properties.name: jwt.expiration
properties.description: The duration (in milliseconds) after which a JWT token will expire.

properties.name: jwt.refresh-expiration
properties.description: The duration after which a refresh JWT token will expire, allowing users to obtain a new JWT without re-authenticating.

properties.name: app.cookie.secure
properties.description: Determines whether cookies should be marked as secure, meaning they are only sent over HTTPS connections.

properties.name: app.cookie.sameSite
properties.description: Specifies the SameSite attribute for cookies, controlling whether cookies are sent with cross-site requests (e.g., 'Strict', 'Lax', 'None').

properties.name: cors.allowed-origins
properties.description: A comma-separated list of allowed origins for Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) requests.
